input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item keywords and item title.

Item title:
IBM USB Portable Diskette Floppy Drive for IBM Dell Sony Hp Laptop/pc

Item keywords:
IBM 05K9276 External USB Floppy Disk Drive
Work with most laptops and desktops with a functional USB port
Super-slim, lightweight design
Windows 2000, XP, VISTA
Low power requirements, USB powered
Sturdy and attractive
Fully mobile with no power adapter required
Reads and writes 1.44MB diskette media and 720KB

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This USB floppy drive is very handy for users who have to frequently exchange data between their desktop or laptop and a 1.44MB floppy disk. No external power is required as it is USB powered. It is very portable, sturdy and attractive. It works with most laptops and desktops with a functional USB port. This drive is compatible with Windows 2000, XP, VISTA.
input_text.Response B: This is a high quality and reliable IBM USB Portable Diskette Floppy Drive for IBM Dell Sony Hp Laptop/pc. It features a super-slim, lightweight design that is fully mobile with no power adapter required. This floppy disk drive reads and writes 1.44MB diskette media and 720KB. It is compatible with most laptops and desktops with a functional USB port, and is a great accessory for the user on the go.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
